item.title: Blog migration
item.description: It’s finally time to take my blog off of Medium and host it myself.

item.title: Infrastructure as code in the home
item.description: Infrastructure as Code (herein IaC) is ubiquitous when managing large infrastructure deployments. But when we donâ€™t have hundreds of machines to manage, is IaC still useful?

item.title: Log4net rolling file appender with multiple projects
item.description: The purpose of this article is to document a minor frustration I ran into at work a few weeks ago, in the hopes that somebody else with the same issue will stumble across it. If I can save another poor soul some time, then it will be well worth writing this.

item.title: Monterey K104 restoration
item.description: A detailed step-by-step of restoring a keyboard older than I am. Not for the faint-of-keyboard.
